mapper.select: SELECT TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(UPDATE_DATE,'%m.%d') AS UPDATE_DATE, NO FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NO DESC LIMIT 6

SELECT POINT, NO, TITLE, B.NAME AS CREATE_ID, DATE_FORMAT(UPDATE_DATE,'%Y.%m.%d') AS UPDATE_DATE, VIEW FROM NOTICE A, MEMBER B WHERE 1=1 AND A.CREATE_ID = B.STUDENT_ID AND A.UPDATE_ID = B.STUDENT_ID ORDER BY POINT DESC, NO DESC

SELECT NO, TITLE, B.NAME AS CREATE_ID, DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS CREATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, B.NAME AS UPDATE_ID, UPDATE_DATE, VIEW, FILE1, FILE2, FILE3, BODY, POINT FROM NOTICE A, MEMBER B WHERE NO = #{no} AND A.CREATE_ID = B.STUDENT_ID AND A.UPDATE_ID = B.STUDENT_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (CREATE_ID, UPDATE_ID, POINT, TITLE, BODY, FILE1, FILE2, FILE3) VALUES (#{createId}, #{createId}, #{point}, #{title}, #{body}, #{file1}, #{file2}, #{file3})
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET UPDATE_ID = #{updateId}, UPDATE_DATE = NOW(), POINT = #{point}, TITLE = #{title}, BODY = #{body}, FILE1 = #{file1}, FILE2 = #{file2}, FILE3 = #{file3} WHERE NO = #{no}
UPDATE NOTICE SET VIEW = VIEW + 1 WHERE NO = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT NO, TITLE FROM NOTICE WHERE NO IN ((SELECT NO FROM NOTICE WHERE NO < #{no} ORDER BY NO DESC LIMIT 1), (SELECT NO FROM NOTICE WHERE NO > #{no} LIMIT 1))
